fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 3.15 points or 0.02% to settle at 19,993.20. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, advanced 3.01% to 11.69. HDFC Bank, Reliance Industries (RIL) and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The September 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 28 September 2023.
